_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn4:2.2+dn4:2.7: brahmins of Campā, householders of Campā
before^dn4:24.10^who_around: a large Saṅgha of around five hundred mendicants, King Seniya Bimbisāra of Magadha, the student Aṅgaka
before^dn4:24.10^who_mentioned: the ascetic Buddha, the steward, brahmins of Campā, householders of Campā, the brahmins from abroad, the Order of monks
